assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Delphi study abides by the ethical requirements of the University Hospital of Brussels, aiming to assure ‘rigor, respect and responsibility’ in the conduct of the research project. Ethical approval was not required. Stakeholders participating in the Delphi-study were informed of the study and gave consent for participation.

assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
